name: Coop Pongers
description:
COOP PONGERS

A project made for the PongJam.

With multiple game modes, you and your friend cooperate to keep the ball in the screen for as long as you can! But be careful: a new mode begins in every round!

Controls:

 - Player 1: W & S;

 - Player 2: UpArrow & DownArrow;

Game Modes:

 - Wrong Keys: Who had this idea???

 - Ball is Lava: The ball is on FIRE!

 - Teleport Walls: Portals Portals Portals.

 - Balls Rain: A rain of balls? WTF?!

 - Paranoia: Am I crazy, or... is it getting DARK here?!

 - Inverted Paddles: Who am I? Where am I?

 - High Gravity: Your paddles' gravity are turned on!

 - Magic Paddles: One of the paddles makes the balls slower. The other one... super FAST!

 - Mad Balls: The speed of the balls changes in the blink of an eye!

 - Just Pong: There's only one ball, like the classic pong, but it gets faster and faster!

Credits:

IVA1  -  Code & Game Design & QA;

snow in kyoto  -  Code & QA;

BreakingRules Music  -  Music & SFX;
